itunes:summary:
Jarred Taylor and Dan Hollaway sit down with Daniel Sharp and Mike Sency from Pop Smoke Media to discuss how they became one of the biggest military meme pages in the world on Instagram, what they look for in a male pornstar, and how many times it took for them to say JT's trigger word to make him gag on air.
